name: Die Roller for RPGs
description:
A simple, straightforward die roller suitable for use with Role-Playing Games (RPGs).

Allows the user to set the number of dice, die size (d4, d6, d8, d10, d12, d20, d100—aka "percentile dice"), number of low die rolls to drop, per-die modifiers (-20 to +20), and total number of throws of a combination of dice, die size, and low drops. History of recent rolls is maintained in a way which can by copied & pasted into other text documents.

A user creating a new character, for example, might set the die size to d6, the number of dice to "Roll @ once" to 4, the number of low rolls to drop to 1, and the number of "Total rolls" to 6, to generate 6 total 4d6 (drop lowest) ability scores. This will give a total of 6 scores, in the range of 3-18, tending toward the 13 average score range.
